column17:
Pepe Jeans London Hotride Blue Men Jeans:
Pepe Jeans London unveils its Hotride collection of denims which includes these blue jeans as well. This pair of straight jeans is made of denim due to which it is durable easily washable and comfortable. An attractive message and the brand name are embroidered near the pockets of these jeans which look attractive. Wear this pair of jeans from Pepe Jeans London below a vibrant T-shirt and get a cool summer look.
